file.name: swaggerMetaData.yaml
file.content:
components: securitySchemes: AuthorizationToken: bearerFormat: nonce token or JWT description: OAuth Bearer Token - A valid Bearer token to prove authorization scheme: bearer type: http info: description: |- The Breeding API (BrAPI) is a Standardized REST ful Web Service API Specification for communicating Plant Breeding Data. BrAPI allows for easy data sharing between databases and tools involved in plant breeding.

General Reference Documentation

URL Structure
Response Structure
Date/Time Encoding
Location Encoding
Error Handling
Search Services

BrAPI Core

The BrAPI Core module contains high level entities used for organization and management. This includes Programs, Trials, Studies, Locations, People, and Lists
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary

BrAPI Phenotyping

The BrAPI Phenotyping module contains entities related to phenotypic observations. This includes Observation Units, Observations, Observation Variables, Traits, Scales, Methods, and Images
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary

BrAPI Genotyping

The BrAPI Genotyping module contains entities related to genotyping analysis. This includes Samples, Markers, Variant Sets, Variants, Call Sets, Calls, References, Reads, and Vendor Orders
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary

BrAPI Germplasm

The BrAPI Germplasm module contains entities related to germplasm management. This includes Germplasm, Germplasm Attributes, Seed Lots, Crosses, Pedigree, and Progeny
V2.0
GitHub
SwaggerHub
Apiary
title: BrAPI-Core version: '2.0' openapi: 3.0.0 paths: {} security: - AuthorizationToken: [] servers: - url: https://test-server.brapi.org/brapi/v2 tags: - name: Server Info description: Check the available calls on a server externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Common Crop Names description: List of crops supported by this server externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Programs description: Information about Programs externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Trials description: Information about Trials externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Studies description: Information about Studies externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Locations description: Information about Locations externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Seasons description: Information about Seasons externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: Lists description: Create and manipulate generic lists externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/ - name: People description: Create and manipulate information about people externalDocs: description: Docs url: https://wiki.brapi.org/
